body:
> Is the theory here that we aren't properly dealing with the old UI, and that is what the leaking tests are using? so handling both the old and new UIs correctly will fix the leak?

Flip old and new (it's the new UI test that is leaking), but yes.
body_text:

body_html:
Is the theory here that we aren't properly dealing with the old UI, and that is what the leaking tests are using? so handling both the old and new UIs correctly will fix the leak?

Flip old and new (it's the new UI test that is leaking), but yes.
